pages.text: The $(item)Macerator$() uses Zaps to crush items. This can be used to $(major)get more from ores$() and other items, make dusts, and separate items like Wool into String.

Some recipes have a chance to make a second item. For example, Raw Iron has a 35% chance of making a second Iron Dust.$(br2)It costs 400âš¡ to crush an item.$(br2)Without $(l:ftbic:items/upgrades)upgrades$(), it accepts only LV current.
